questiontext.text: What is your body try to maintain stable in homeostasis?
One of the most important things your body need to maintain stable in order to produce energy for our body cells is?
To make sure that all the cells in your body can receive oxygen and nutrients that they need, this system below is crucial for that function. What system is it?
The smallest functional unit in human body is?
Below are things that your body need to maintain stable in homeostasis, EXCEPT….?

Homeostasis is constantly threatened to be disrupted, not just by external factors but also by some internal factors.

Example of internal factor as a disruptor can be shown in condition below:

answer.text: A young boy died of drug over dosed
A baby born with a congenital disease
A farmer get bitten by a snake
Extreme storm and cold weather freeze a hiker to death

questiontext.text: Protein is digested for the first time at?
Emulsification of fat in small intestine is carried away by fluid that is secreted by?
Saliva can protect us from microorganisms. Bacteria are prevented from taking Fe from our food due to ….. in our saliva?
Digestion does not occur in part of our digestive system below…which one is it?
HCl or stomach acid does not destroy our stomach due to HCl can not pass between the stomach cells as there is…..between the cells
Bile salt from gallbladder work in digestive system by?

answer.text: Change fat into triglycerides and fatty acid

questiontext.text: Which one of below that function to neutralize acid from stomach that enters the small intestine?
You can control when you want to defecate because defecation control also can be carried away by?
Respiratory system contributes in homeostasis by maintaining level of oxygen, carbon dioxide and …. in blood stay normal
What external respiration means?

answer.text: Gas exchange between alveoli and lung vascular/capillary

questiontext.text: Which below is included in conduction zone of respiratory system ?
Alveolus is kept expanding and not collapsing due to….?
O2 transport in blood mostly in the form of?
Pleural cavity plays an important role in making sure the lungs can expand back after collapsing when we expire air out of the lungs, as it has?
In respiratory process such as ventilation, what muscle involve in normal/quite expiration?

A hormone is synthesized from cholesterol. Where does the receptor of such hormone located within its target cell?)

Suatu hormon terbentuk dari kolesterol. Di manakah lokasi reseptor hormon itu pada sel targetnya?

answer.text:
On cell membrane because the hormone is lipid-soluble /

Di permukaan membran sel, karena hormon itu larut lemak

On cell membrane because the hormone is water-soluble /

Di permukaan membran sel, karena hormon itu larut air

On mitochondria because the hormone is water-soluble /

Di mitokondria, karena hormon itu larut air

In cytoplasma because the hormone is lipid-soluble / 

Di dalam sitoplasma sel, karena hormon itu larut lemak

In cytoplasma because the hormone is water-soluble / 

Di dalam sitoplasma sel, karena hormon itu larut air

questiontext.text:
A man is about to sleep in the night. He shuts down all of his light-emitting electronics. He also shuts his window curtain tightly. What is the effect of his actions on the level of his hormone that regulates his circadian rhythm?)

Seorang laki-laki hendak tidur malam. Ia mematikan semua alat elektronik yang mengeluarkan cahaya serta menutup tirai jendela rapat-rapat. Apakah efek tindakan laki-laki itu terhadap produksi hormon tubuhnya yang mengatur siklus bangun-tidur?

answer.text:
He inhibits melatonin production from his pituitary /

Dia menekan produksi melatonin dari hipofisisnya

He inhibits melatonin production from his pineal /

Dia menekan produksi melatonin dari pinealnya

He stimulates melatonin production from his pituitary /

Dia memicu produksi melatonin dari hipofisisnya

He inhibits melanin production from his pineal /

Dia menekan produksi melanin dari pinealnya

He stimulates melanin production from his pineal /

Dia memicu produksi melatonin dari pinealnya

questiontext.text:
A woman is being examined to check her the level of LH in her blood. What is the process that is triggered by drastic rise and fall of the hormone mentioned above?

Seorang perempuan diperiksa kadar LH dalam darahnya. Apakah proses pada perempuan tersebut yang normalnya dipicu akibat peningkatan dan penurunan kadar hormon tersebut secara drastis?

A hormone stimulates lipolysis which is degradation of fat tissue in order to provide energy for all body cells. This hormone is secreted by anterior pituitary. What hormone is it?

Suatu hormon memicu lipolisis atau penguraian jaringan lemak untuk menyediakan energi bagi seluruh sel-sel tubuh. Hormon ini disekresi di hipofisis anterior. Apakah hormon yang dimaksud?

A woman drink water as much as she can because she is going to be examined with an ultrasound machine. What hormone in her body that is most likely to be decreased in that situation?

Seorang perempuan minum air banyak-banyak karena akan diperiksa dengan alat USG. Apakah hormon perempuan itu yang paling mungkin mungkin mengalami penurunan kadar pada kondisi tersebut?

A mother is is sad because her breastmilk is very little which makes her baby hungry most of the time. What are the hormones that has low activity in her breast tissue in that situation?

Seorang ibu merasa sedih karena ASI-nya sangat sedikit sehingga bayinya selalu lapar. Apakah hormon-hormon yang rendah aktivitasnya di jaringan payudara ibu itu?

A woman tries to reduce her weight by not having breakfast and lunch while keep drinking water as usual. What hormone that is most likely to be increased in her body around afternoon

Seorang perempuan sedang berusaha menurunkan berat badannya dengan cara tidak makan pagi ataupun makan siang namun tetap minum air seperti biasa. Apakah hormon yang paling mungkin mengalami peningkatan kadar di tubuh perempuan tersebut di siang hari?

A mother is in her 8th month of pregnancy. She feels that her breasts are much enlarged compared to before her pregnancy. Which hormone that is most likely to be responsible for that effect?

Seorang ibu hamil memasuki masa kehamilan bulan ke-8. Ia merasa payudaranya sangat membesar dibanding sebelum hamil. Apakah hormon yang paling berperan menimbulkan efek tersebut pada tubuhnya?

What hormone that become a marker for pregnancy because it is detected early in pregnancy?

Apakah hormon yang menjadi penanda terjadinya kehamilan karena terdeteksi di awal-awal kehamilan?

A man is performing a special fasting called “mutih” in which he do not consume anything that contains salt. What hormone that is most likely to be decreased in his body?

Seorang laki-laki sedang berpuasa “mutih” atau tidak mengonsumsi apapun yang bergaram selama 1 pekan terakhir. Apakah hormon yang paling mungkin mengalami penurunan kadar pada tubuh laki-laki tersebut?

Mr. Amir, 70 years old, comes to the polyclinic with complaints of balance disorders that occur suddenly. The disturbed brain structure is….

Pak Amir, 70 tahun datang ke poliklinik dengan keluhan gangguan keseimbangan yang terjadi secara tiba-tiba. Struktur otak yang mengalami gangguan adalah….

Amri, 50 years old, came to the polyclinic with a sudden complaint of blindness in both eyes. The area of ​​the cerebral cortex that disturbed in these conditions is...

Amri, 50 tahun datang ke poliklinik dengan keluhan buta pada kedua mata yang dialami secara tiba-tiba. Daerah korteks serebri mengalami gangguan pada kondisi tersebut adalah …

Mr Joko, 50 years old, who works as a farmer, came to the emergency unit accompanied by his family with complaints of stiffness throughout his body and difficult to open his mouth. History of stepping on rusty nails one month ago. Mr Joko was diagnosed with tetanus. Neurotransmitters that are affected by this condition are ...

Pak Joko, 50 tahun, pekerjaan petani, datang ke unit rawat darurat diantar oleh keluarganya dengan keluhan kekakuan seluruh tubuh dan mulut susah dibuka. Riwayat menginjak paku berkarat satu bulan yang lalu. Oleh dokter, Pak Joko didiagnosis mengalami tetanus. Neurotransmitter yang mengalami gangguan pada kondisi tersebut adalah…

The characteristics of the autonomic nervous system:

Ciri-ciri dari sistem saraf otonom:

answer.text: Acethylcholine is the only neurotransmitter / Neurotransmitternya hanya asetilkolin
There is no paravertebral ganglion / Tidak ada ganglion paravertebral
Have one neuron from central nerve to the effector / Memiliki satu neuron mulai dari saraf pusat hingga efektor
Out of ventral cornu spinal medulla / Keluar dari kornu ventral medulla spinalis

questiontext.text:
A pain signal is traveling from the periphery to the spinal cord, to the hypothalamus and finally to the sensory cortex. What process is going on?

Suatu sinyal nyeri sedang berjalan dari perifer ke medulla spinalis, hingga ke hipothalamus hingga akhirnya menuju ke korteks sensorik. Proses apakah yang sedang terjadi?

A medical student is running for 30 minutes. If the student's blood pressure was compared between before running, during running, and after getting enough rest, what was the most likely pattern of blood pressure?

Seorang mahasiswa kedokteran sedang berolahraga lari selama 30 menit. Jika tekanan darah mahasiswa itu dibandingkan antara sebelum berlari, selama berlari, dan sesudah cukup beristirahat, bagaimana pola tekanan darahnya yang paling mungkin?

A 19 year old teen swims for 45 minutes. If the pulse frequency of the teenager was compared between before swimming, during swimming, and after getting enough rest, what is the most likely pattern of pulse frequency?

Seorang remaja berusia 19 tahun berenang selama 45 menit. Jika frekuensi nadi remaja itu dibandingkan antara sebelum berenang, selama berenang, dan sesudah cukup beristirahat, bagaimana pola frekuensi nadinya yang paling mungkin?

Which of the following determines myocardial function?

Manakah dari berikut ini yang merupakan penentu fungsi miokard?

Which of the following calcium sources and transport mechanisms is NOT important in coupling excitation-contraction on a beat-to-beat basis in cardiac myocytes?

Manakah dari sumber kalsium dan mekanisme transportasi kalsium berikut yang TIDAK penting dalam penggandengan eksitasi-kontraksi dengan basis denyut-ke-denyut dalam miosit jantung?

Which of the following comes closest to increasing left ventricular preload?

Manakah dari berikut ini yang paling mendekati peningkatan preload ventrikel kiri?

answer.text: Increased diastolic end volume / Peningkatan volume akhir diastolik
Increased final diastolic pressure / Peningkatan tekanan diastolik akhir
Both of the above / Kedua hal di atas
Increased final systolic radius / Peningkatan radius sistolik akhir

questiontext.text:
A badminton player has a cardiac output of 5 liters per minute and a heart rate of 50 beats per minute. How much is the stroke volume?

Seorang pemain Badminton memiliki curah jantung istirahat sebesar 5 liter per menit dan frekuensi jantung 50 denyut permenit . Berapa isi sekuncupnya?

Which of the following statements reflects the proper pathway of an action potential through the heart?

Mana dari pernyataan berikut yang mencerminkan jalur yang tepat untuk hantaran sebuah potensial aksi melalui jantung ?

answer.text: AV Node, AV bundle, SA node, Purkinje fibers, bundle branches
AV node, bundle branches, AV bundle, SA node, Purkinje fibers
SA node, AV node, AV bundle, Bundle branches, Purkinje fibers
SA node, AV bundle, bundle branches, AV node, Purkinje fibers
SA node, AV node, Purkinje fibers, bundle branches, AV bundle

questiontext.text:
Which of the following conditions will not increase the stroke volume?

Mana dari kondisi berikut yang tidak akan meningkatkan isi sekuncup?

answer.text: Increased Ca2+ in interstitial fluid / Meningkatnya Ca2+ di cairan interstitial
Increased K+ in interstitial fluid / Meningkatkan K+ di cairan interstitial
Increased venous return / Meningkatnya aliran balik vena
Low frequency of resting heart / Frekuensi jantung istirahat yang rendah

questiontext.text:
If there is an increase in the number of erythrocytes in a person's blood, what are DIRECT EFFECTS that most likely to happen?

Jika terjadi peningkatan jumlah eritrosit dalam darah seseorang, apakah EFEK LANGSUNG yang paling mungkin terjadi?

answer.text: Increased activity of respiratory system / Peningkatan aktivitas sistem respirasi
Increased production of epinefrin / Peningkatan produksi hormon epinefrin
Increased venous return to heart / Peningkatan aliran vena kembali jantung
Increased Na+ in blood / Peningkatan kadar natrium dalam darah

questiontext.text:
If there is a chronic / prolonged decrease in skeletal muscle activity in the lower extremities, what are DIRECT EFFECTS that most likely to happen?

Jika terjadi penurunan aktivitas otot rangka yang kronik/ lama pada ekstremitas bawah, apakah EFEK LANGSUNG yang paling mungkin terjadi?

answer.text: Decreased activity of respiratory system / Penurunan aktivitas sistem respirasi
Decreased production of epinefrin / Penurunan produksi hormon epinefrin
Decreased venous return to heart / Penurunan aliran vena kembali jantung
Decrease Na+ in blood / Penurunan kadar natrium dalam darah

questiontext.text:
If there is a complete vasodilation / widening of the arterioles in multiple organs, what is the most likely effect?

Jika terjadi vasodilatasi/ pelebaran diameter arteriol yang menyeluruh di banyak organ, apakah efek yang paling mungkin terjadi?

answer.text: Increased systemic blood pressure / Peningkatan tekanan darah sistemik
Decreased systemic blood pressure / Penurunan tekanan darah sistemik
Increased mean blood pressure / Peningkatan tekanan darah rerata
Decreased lung blood pressure / Penurunan tekanan darah paru
Increased lung blood pressure / Peningkatan tekanan darah paru

questiontext.text:
If more aldosterone is produced than usual, what are DIRECT EFFECTS that most likely to happen?

Jika aldosteron diproduksi lebih banyak daripada biasanya, apakah EFEK LANGSUNG yang paling mungkin terjadi?

answer.text: Increased skeletal muscle contraction / Peningkatan kontraksi otot rangka
Increased red blood cells count / Peningkatan jumlah sel darah merah

questiontext.text:
What are the conditions that most likely can lower mean arterial pressure in a person's body?

Apakah kondisi yang paling mungkin menurunkan tekanan arteri rerata (mean arterial pressure) pada tubuh seseorang?

Which is the proper route of blood through the heart from the systemic circulation to the pulmonary circulation and back to the systemic circulation?

Dari pertanyaan berikut ini yang mana merupakan rute darah yang tepat melalui jantung dari sirkulasi sistemik ke sirkulasi paru dan kembali ke sirkulasi sistemik ?

answer.text:
Left atrium, pulmonary semilunar valve, right atrium, tricuspid valve, left ventricle, aorta semilunar valve, right ventricle, mitral valve /

Atrium kiri, katup semilunaris paru, atrium kanan, katup tricuspid, ventrikel kiri, katup semilunaris aorta, ventrikel kanan, katup mitral.

Right atrium, mitral valve, right ventricle, pulmonary semilunar valve, left atrium, tricuspid valve, left ventricle, aorta semilunar valve /

Atrium kanan, katup mitral, ventrikel kanan, katup semilunaris paru, atrium kiri, katup tricuspid, ventrikel kiri, katup semilunaris aorta.

Left atrium, tricuspid valve, left ventricle, pulmonary semilunar valve, right atrium, mitral valve, right ventricle, aorta semilunar valve /

Atrium kiri, katup tricuspid, ventrikel kiri, katup semilunaris paru, atrium kanan, katup mitral,ventrikel kanan, katup semilunaris aorta.

Right atrium, tricuspid valve, right ventricle, pulmonary semilunar valve, left atrium, mitral valve, left ventricle, aorta semilunar valve /

Atrium kanan, katup tricuspid, ventrikel kanan, katup semilunaris paru, atrium kiri, katup mitral, ventrikel kiri, , katup semilunaris aorta.

Left ventricle, mitral valve, left atrium, pulmonary semilunar valve, right ventricle, tricuspid valve, right atrium, aorta semilunar valve / 

Ventrikel kiri, katup mitral, atrium kiri, katup semilunaris paru, ventrikel kanan, katup tricuspid, atrium kanan, katup semilunaris aorta.
